Computer Science.name: AI/ML Engineer
Computer Science.overview: A comprehensive course covering modern machine learning techniques, deep learning frameworks, and practical AI applications.
Computer Science.career_outlook: High demand for AI/ML engineers with projected 20% annual growth in the field.

Computer Science.name: Web Developer
Computer Science.overview: Learn to build responsive, modern web applications using industry-standard tools and frameworks.
Computer Science.career_outlook: Abundant opportunities in startups, tech companies, and freelance markets.

Computer Science.name: Cybersecurity Specialist
Computer Science.overview: Master the skills to protect systems and networks from digital attacks and security breaches.
Computer Science.career_outlook: Critical shortage of cybersecurity professionals worldwide with excellent compensation.

Electrical.name: Electrical Design Engineer
Electrical.overview: Develop expertise in designing electrical systems, power distribution networks, and control systems.
Electrical.career_outlook: Steady demand in infrastructure, manufacturing, and renewable energy sectors.

Electrical.name: IoT Specialist
Electrical.overview: Learn to design and implement connected device ecosystems and smart home technologies.
Electrical.career_outlook: Rapidly growing field with applications across consumer and industrial markets.

Mechanical.name: CAD Designer
Mechanical.overview: Master computer-aided design for mechanical components and assemblies.
Mechanical.career_outlook: Essential skill for various manufacturing industries with stable job market.

Mechanical.name: Robotics Engineer
Mechanical.overview: Design, build and program robotic systems for industrial and consumer applications.
Mechanical.career_outlook: Growing demand in automation, healthcare, and advanced manufacturing.

Civil.name: Structural Engineer
Civil.overview: Learn structural analysis, design principles, and building code compliance.
Civil.career_outlook: Consistent demand in construction, infrastructure development, and consulting.

Biology.name: Bioinformatics Specialist
Biology.overview: Apply computational methods to analyze biological data and solve complex biological problems.
Biology.career_outlook: Emerging field with opportunities in research, pharma, and biotech companies.

Commerce.name: Financial Analyst
Commerce.overview: Develop skills in financial analysis, forecasting, and investment evaluation.
Commerce.career_outlook: Strong demand in banking, investment firms, and corporate finance departments.

Arts.name: Digital Content Creator
Arts.overview: Learn to create engaging digital content across multiple platforms and formats.
Arts.career_outlook: Expanding opportunities in marketing, entertainment, and independent content creation.
